mapper.sql: m.TRANS_RULE_ID, m.INS_ID, m.PLATFORM_ID, m.MCHNT_ID, m.SHOP_ID, m.START_TIME, m.END_TIME, m.IS_SUPERPOSED, m.SALIENCE, m.TRANS_RULE_DESP, m.DATA_STAT, m.REMARKS, m.CREATE_USER, m.UPDATE_USER, m.CREATE_TIME, m.UPDATE_TIME, m.LOCK_VERSION
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_TRANS_RULE ( TRANS_RULE_ID, INS_ID, PLATFORM_ID, MCHNT_ID, SHOP_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, IS_SUPERPOSED, SALIENCE, TRANS_RULE_DESP, DATA_STAT, REMARKS, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, LOCK_VERSION ) VALUES ( #{transRuleId}, #{insId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platformId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mchntId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSuperposed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salience,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transRuleDesp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, '0')
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_TRANS_RULE SET INS_ID=#{insId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLATFORM_ID=#{platformId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MCHNT_ID=#{mchntId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_ID=#{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_TIME=#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_TIME=#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_SUPERPOSED=#{isSuperposed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALIENCE=#{salience,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANS_RULE_DESP=#{transRuleDesp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_STAT=#{dataStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS=#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME=sysdate WHERE TRANS_RULE_ID = #{transRuleId}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM TB_TRANS_RULE m WHERE m.DATA_STAT='0' AND m.TRANS_RULE_ID=#{transRuleId}

SELECT TRANS_RULE_ID, INS_ID, PLATFORM_ID, MCHNT_ID, SHOP_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, TRANS_RULE_DESP, IS_SUPERPOSED, DATA_STAT, SALIENCE, TEMPLATE_CODE, TEMPLATE_NAME, TEMPLATE_DESP, TEMPLATE_FROM, RULE_TYPE_CODE, RULE_NAME, RULE_TYPE, RULE_ID, RULE_FACTOR_NUM, RULE_FACTOR_ID, RULE_FACTOR, RULE_PARAM FROM VIEW_TRANS_RULE_DECLARE m WHERE m.DATA_STAT='0' AND m.RULE_ID=#{ruleId}
